name: Archino
description:
Find bones for the upcomming human exhibition.

On your quest to complete one whole skeleton you will find that the job of an archeologist is more dangerous than you might think.

Credits:
  • Perla - Artist - https://www.instagram.com/lurla/
  • Fabio - Artist
  • Marcel (me) - Developer - https://www.instagram.com/gwydi.me/
Known Issues
  • There is no Menu Screen
  • There is no Exit Button (use ALT+F4)
